Runebound Spells

Runebound Spells, also known as Runes are quite unique. On the power level, they are not that much stronger than Petty Spells, but they can be Channelled, Memorized and Overcast, making them more akin to Arcane Spells.

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.r6T7RoK3AYG5ShbF]{Claustra} – Lock Rune. Magically seals any lock without the need for a key. Only original key or Caster can unlock the lock for the duration.

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.cCJMjFE3vIDZ71xo]{Fax} – Flame Rune. Creates flames of varying intensity. Can be used as a magic missile attack

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.QmPLRdQCGz7fgDxM]{Lepos} – Allure Rune. Charms Target making them more amenable or less hostile.

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.alIHMBXC7Ow21m51]{Pulso} – Push Rune. Pushes Target away, can trip them. Can be used to destroy doors or weak walls.

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.RK2c5hc7qMpKinSH]{Sopio} – Lull Rune. Puts Target to sleep.

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.zv40HcEkRtq91u2z]{Tego} – Conceal Rune. Makes Target harder to notice by concealing their presence.

  • @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.tMwYo0P0xyR6rB7c]{Tutor} – Ward Rune. Protects Target against attacks from bigger enemies.

Runes

Runes have the following description:

Name: Rune's name
Type: Rune's type, determines on what kind of Item it can be Engraved (Weapon, Armour, Talismanic).
Power: Rune's Power, this determines the difficulty and length of Empowering and Binding phases
Permanent Effect: Here is described Rune's effect if Rune was Engraved as Permanent. Unless stated otherwise, this effect can be activated and deactivated by holder at will and counts as a Free Action
Temporary Effect: Effect of the rune if it was Engraved as Temporary. Unless stated otherwise, it can be activated as a Free Action, but only once. When the Rune's effect ends, Rune disappears and Item receives 1 Damage (Armour receives 1 Damage on random location).

To apply a Rune to an Item, drag a respective Effect from one of the items found in the "Runes" folder in the Forien's Armoury Compendium.

For example, to apply Temporary Rune of Cleaving, open the @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.a0HD1sx7SS4ZCw5A]{Weapon Runes} item, switch to "Effects" tab, find Rune of Cleaving (Temporary) and drag it onto a World Item.

This must be done before giving the item to a character!

Rune of Cleaving

Type: Weapon
Power: 3
Permanent Effect: Attacks made with a weapon engraved with this Rune deal +1 Damage.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Rune of Durability

Type: Weapon
Power: 3
Permanent Effect: Weapon Engraved with this Rune gains Unbreakable Quality.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Rune of Fate

Type: Talismanic
Power: 4
Permanent Effect: This Rune cannot be made.
Temporary Effect: Negates the first attack that would reduce Wounds to 0.

Rune of Fire

Type: Weapon
Power: 5
Permanent Effect: Wielder of a weapon engraved with this Rune can command it to burst into flames. Weapon illuminates area around wielder like a @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.l7KTze1BpfCsW5qn]{Torch}. Additionally, any time a target hit with this weapon suffers a Critical Hit, he receices an additional @Condition[Ablaze] Condition.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Rune of Fortitude

Type: Armour
Power: 4
Permanent Effect: Wearer of an Armour Engraved with this Rune gains +4 Wounds.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Rune of Fracture

Type: Weapon
Power: 5
Permanent Effect: Wielder of a weapon engraved with this Rune can command it to be overcome with power surge. Weapon gains @Property[Impact] Quality, but loses 2 Damage per attack.
Temporary Effect: This Rune cannot be made.

Rune of the Furnace

Type: Talismanic
Power: 6
Permanent Effect: Character bearing an item inscribed with this Rune is immune to fire damage of any kind. Additionally, @Condition[Ablaze]{Ablaze} Conditions are immediately removed after they are gained.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Rune of Fury

Type: Weapon
Power: 5
Permanent Effect: Wielder of a weapon engraved with this Rune gains a @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.BlHVzfs0Ow6IYEDw]{Furious Assault} talent.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Rune of Grudges

Type: Weapon
Power: 4
Permanent Effect: Character wielding weapon Engraved with this Rune can, on the first Round of Combat, nominate an enemy as the Target of this Rune. For the remainder of the Combat, you can reroll all failed attacks against the Target.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Rune of Iron

Type: Armour
Power: 5
Permanent Effect: This Rune reduces damage from incoming attacks by 1. Works even against attacks that normally ignore Armour.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Rune of Luck

Type: Talismanic
Power: 4
Permanent Effect: Wielder of an accessory Engraved with this Rune gains a @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.u0CFf3xwiyidD9T5]{Luck} Talent.
Temporary Effect: Can be activated only once. When activated, counts as if the owner used a Fortune Point.

Rune of Might

Type: Weapon
Power: 5
Permanent Effect: Attacks made with a weapon engraved with this Rune against a target with Toughness Bonus 5 or more are treated as if the attacker had double Strength Bonus.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Rune of Page

Type: Talismanic
Power: 4
Permanent Effect: Wielder of an accessory Engraved with this Rune gains +1 Movement.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Rune of Resistance

Type: Armour
Power: 6
Permanent Effect: If a character wearing an Armour Engraved with this Rune is about to lose Wounds due to an attack or effect that ignores Toughness Bonus and Armour Points, the character can make a Toughness Test with -5 modifier per Wound to be lost. If succeeded, character loses no Wounds.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Rune of Shielding

Type: Armour
Power: 5
Permanent Effect: Non-magical ranged weapons used to attack a character wearing an Armour Engraved with this Rune suffer a -20 modifier on Hit Tests.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Rune of Speed

Type: Weapon
Power: 4
Permanent Effect: If the wielder is not @Condition[Surprised] and has this weapon in hands at the start of the Combat, he gains +1d10 bonus to his combat initiative score.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but can only be activated once.

Rune of Spellbreaking

Type: Talismanic
Power: 6
Permanent Effect: This Rune cannot be made.
Temporary Effect: Activate this Rune to immediately end any persistent spell within 12 yards. Additionally, if Runesmith is holding this item, he can instead attempt to Dispel any incoming spell and gains +20 modifier to that attempt. Activating this rune takes an Action.

Rune of Spelleating

Type: Talismanic
Power: 6
Permanent Effect: This Rune cannot be made.
Temporary Effect: Activate this Rune to immediately end any persistent spell within 12 yards. Additionally, if Runesmith is holding this item, he can instead attempt to Dispel any incoming spell and gains +20 modifier to that attempt. If you succeed, the opposing caster can’t use that spell again within the next 24 hours. Activating this rune takes an Action.

Rune of Stone

Type: Armour
Power: 3
Permanent Effect: Armour Engraved with this Rune gains +1 AP on all of its protected locations.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Rune of Striking

Type: Weapon
Power: 4
Permanent Effect: Weapon Engraved with this Rune grants whoever wields it additional +10 Weapon Skill.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Rune of Warding

Type: Talismanic
Power: 3
Permanent Effect: Wielder of an accessory Engraved with this Rune gains a @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.eowbsW6oHGSNJmxV]{Magic Resistance} Talent.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Master Rune of Adamant

Type: Armour
Power: 7
Permanent Effect: Wearer of an Armour Engraved with this Rune gains +10 Toughness.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Master Rune of Alaric the Mad

Type: Weapon
Power: 8
Permanent Effect: Attacks made with a Weapon Engraved with this Rune ignore all Armour Points.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Master Rune of Balance

Type: Talismanic
Power: 10
Permanent Effect: Can be used only by Runesmiths. A single Spellcaster within 48 yards gains a -20 modifier to all Casting and Channeling Tests for Runesmith's Willpower Bonus rounds. Rune cannot be activated again while it's effect is still in place.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but can only be activated once.

Master Rune of Breaking

Type: Weapon
Power: 8
Permanent Effect: After a successfull parry (won Opposed Melee Test), the wielder of a Wepon Engraved with this Rune may perform an Opposed Strength Test against the opponent. If wielder wins, the opponent's weapon breaks (unless it has an Unbreakable Quality).
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but can only be activated once.

Master Rune of Dismay

Type: Talismanic (War Horn)
Power: 9
Permanent Effect: Can only be inscribed on a war horn. When horn Engraved with this Rune is sounded, all enemies within 48 yards of the user must pass a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test or suffer a @Condition[Stunned]{Stunned} Condition. Activation takes an Action and can only be used once per Encounter.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but can only be activated once.

Master Rune of Flight

Type: Weapon (Hammer)
Power: 8
Permanent Effect: Can only be inscribed on a hammer. Allows the hammer to be thrown and the wielder is treated as having @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.NSnpJQiky8JcMnme]{Ranged (Throwing)} skill. Hammer has a range of 24 yards and the thrower gains a +30 Ballistic Skill. Hammer returns to the thrower’s hand at the end of his round.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but can only be activated once.

Master Rune of Gromril

Type: Armour
Power: 10
Permanent Effect: Armour Engraved with this Rune gains +2 AP on all of its protected locations.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Master Rune of Skalf Blackhammer

Type: Weapon
Power: 9
Permanent Effect: Weapon Engraved with this Rune gains Impact Quality and +3 Damage.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Master Rune of Snorri Spangelhelm

Type: Weapon
Power: 11
Permanent Effect: Wielder of a Weapon Engraved with this Rune gains +30 Weapon Skill.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Master Rune of Spite

Type: Talismanic
Power: 8
Permanent Effect: Talisman Engraved with this Rune reduced damage from incoming attacks by 2. Works even against attacks that normally ignore Armour.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Master Rune of Steel

Type: Armour
Power: 9
Permanent Effect: Non-magical weapons used to hit a character wearing an Armour Engraved with this Rune are treated as if they were Undamaging.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.

Master Rune of Swiftness

Type: Weapon
Power: 6
Permanent Effect: Weapon Engraved with this Rune gains Fast Quality.
Temporary Effect: As Permanent Effect, but it lasts only for 1 minute.
